title: Backend Software Engineer
points: Engineered IoT solutions for the aquaculture industry.
Improved the backend system's reliability by applying consistent design patterns, increasing test coverage, and writing meaningful documentation.
Designed and implemented a real-time event-driven architecture.
Assisted firmware and frontend development teams to troubleshoot issues and propose solutions.
Collaborated with teams from other companies to integrate with external services.
Deployed and monitored backend infrastructure in AWS.
